message: Bob, I'm offering you the product for $1,400,000. This is a fair price considering its value to you.  Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,300,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, considering the product's value to you.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $1,300,000 is still a bit low for me.  I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,350,000.  This price still leaves some room for both of us to benefit from this deal.  Let's see if we can find common ground here.

I understand your concerns, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $1,350,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $1,325,000. This is as high as I'm willing to go, considering the value of the product to me.
